summary: So i decided to rextexture some armour, it adds a coloured chain armour to nightinggale
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://www.abload.de/img/nightingale_daedric_rw6aa2.png[/img][/center]
 
====
INFO
====
 
This mod I made is basically a retexture for the Nightingale. The new textures are about 50% of a high res texture texture, I added loads of little decals like chains to the armor itself.
 
I hope you enjoy this!
 
 
============
INSTALLATION
============
 
To install just put the textures and meshes files into your skyrim data folder or use the Nexus Mod Manager for automatic installation.
author: Countercruel
